item.title: 人工智能热潮推动德克萨斯州西部荒野土地所有者股价上涨 230
item.description:
亚马逊、微软和其他公司正在向规模庞大的美国数据中心投入资金

。【原文：

Amazon, Microsoft and others are plowing money into sprawling US data centers

】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯提议在陷入困境的钢铁部门裁员 1.1 万人
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯股份公司（Thyssenkrupp AG）的钢铁部门计划在本十年内裁撤或外包 11,000 个工作岗位，此举将缩减因全球钢铁供应过剩和能源价格上涨而损失数十亿欧元的业务。【原文：Thyssenkrupp AG’s steel unit plans to eliminate or outsource 11,000 jobs this decade, a move that would shrink a business that’s lost billions of euros to a global steel glut and rising energy prices.】

item.title: 英国监管机构坚持泰晤士河水务公司关键决策时间表
item.description: 英国监管机构将按照原定时间表对泰晤士水务公司的下一个大型商业计划做出重要决定，排除了进一步挤压这家陷入困境的公用事业公司财务的延迟可能性。【原文：UK regulators will stick to the original timetable for a key decision on Thames Water’s next big business plan, ruling out a delay that would further squeeze the finances of the troubled utility.】

item.title: 与会代表称欧佩克+将 12 月 1 日石油政策会议移至网上举行
item.description: 与会代表表示，欧佩克+计划在本周末举行在线会议，而非最初计划的面对面会议。【原文：OPEC+ plans to hold this weekend’s meeting online rather than in-person as originally indicated, delegates said.】

item.title: 欧盟认为与中国达成避免征收电动汽车关税的协议进展甚微
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，最近几周，欧盟与中国就一项全面协议取代电动汽车关税的谈判只取得了有限的进展。【原文：The European Union has only seen limited progress in recent weeks in negotiations with China over a comprehensive deal to replace tariffs on electric vehicles, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Blackstone 与 EQT 成立 35 亿美元天然气管道合资企业
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 管理的基金同意投资 35 亿美元与 EQT Corp. 成立一家合资企业，使这家美国天然气生产商能够减少债务。【原文：Funds managed by Blackstone Inc. agreed to invest $3.5 billion to create a joint venture with EQT Corp., enabling the US natural gas producer to reduce its debt.】

item.title: 阿布扎比穆巴达拉公司将以 34 亿加元的交易价格将 CI Financial 私有化
item.description: 加拿大共同基金管理公司 CI Financial Corp. 计划在阿布扎比穆巴达拉资本（Mubadala Capital）的支持下，以约 47 亿加元（34 亿美元）的价格进行私有化。【原文：Canadian mutual fund manager CI Financial Corp. plans to go private for about C$4.7 billion ($3.4 billion) in a deal backed by Abu Dhabi’s Mubadala Capital.】

item.title: 阿达尼的法律纠纷可能因投资者诉讼风险而加剧
item.description: 高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）是亚洲数一数二的亿万富翁，他被卷入了一起涉嫌贿赂的阴谋，并面临着从美国到印度的法律诉讼风暴，律师们说，其中最紧迫的可能是投资者的诉讼堆积如山。【原文：Gautam Adani, one of Asia’s top billionaires, is embroiled in an alleged bribery conspiracy and faces a firestorm of legal action from US to India, the most urgent of which could be a piling up of investor lawsuits, say lawyers.】

item.title: 谷歌出售 Chrome 浏览器可能颠覆浏览器市场
item.description: 美国司法部正试图迫使谷歌出售其大受欢迎的 Chrome 浏览器。但首先...【原文：The US Department of Justice is trying to force Google to sell its mega-popular Chrome internet browser. But first...】

item.title: 病毒式传播的魅力手链店
item.description:
TikTok视频挽救了Brooklyn Charm，使其免于倒闭。然后，他们创造了珠宝界的轰动效应。【原文：

TikTok videos saved Brooklyn Charm from going out of business. Then they created a jewelry sensation.

】

item.title: 世界最大债务人迎来新经理：斯科特-贝森特
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们将关注下一任美国财政部长的债务管理计划。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at the next US Treasury secretary’s debt-management plans. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 墨西哥通过港口扩建展望长期贸易前景
item.description: 墨西哥正在投资对该国太平洋沿岸的曼萨尼约港进行大规模扩建，计划将其吞吐能力提高一倍以上，并跻身世界前 20 大集装箱港口之列。【原文：Mexico is investing in a major expansion of the Port of Manzanillo on the country’s Pacific coast, with plans to more than double its capacity and become one of the top 20 container ports in the world.】

item.title: 皇马主席希望改变俱乐部的所有权模式
item.description: 15 次蝉联欧洲足球冠军的皇家马德里正在寻求对公司进行重大改革，将所有权移交给俱乐部成员，从而为第三方投资者敞开大门。【原文：Real Madrid, the 15-time European football champion, is seeking a major corporate shake-up that would hand over ownership to club members, effectively opening the door to third-party investors.】

item.title: 从华盛顿到华尔街认识新任财政部长
item.description: 市场押注斯科特-贝森特将成为特朗普政府内部的一股稳定力量。【原文：Markets are betting Scott Bessent will be a force for stability inside Trump's administration.】

item.title: 尼日利亚经济增长因服务业而意外向好
item.description: 在服务业和石油业的推动下，尼日利亚第三季度的经济增长速度超过预期。【原文：Nigeria’s economy grew faster than anticipated in the third quarter, buoyed by its services and oil sectors.】

item.title: 结构性赤字持续发酵，澳大利亚预算案将出现大爆炸
item.description: 德勤经济咨询公司（Deloitte Access Economics）的数据显示，澳大利亚的预算赤字很可能会超出预期，这与前些年的情况相反，前些年大规模的收入升级最终使账目恢复正常。【原文：Australia’s budget deficit is likely to swell beyond forecasts, in a reversal of previous years when massive revenue upgrades ended up returning the books to the black, according to Deloitte Access Economics.】

item.title: 莫迪盟友的沉默表明阿达尼有一定的政治背景
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的盟友们基本上没有就美国对亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）提出的令人震惊的贿赂指控发表评论，这表明他在印度享有强有力的政治支持。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s allies have largely refrained from commenting on the US’s shock bribery allegations against billionaire Gautam Adani, a sign of the strong political support he enjoys in India.】

item.title: 花旗红利为新财富主管急于改革赢得时间
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）正准备宣布其财富管理业务是该银行增长战略的关键部分，但在幕后，技术却不断制造麻烦。【原文：Citigroup Inc. was preparing to declare its wealth business a key piece of the bank’s growth strategy, but behind the scenes technology kept stirring up trouble.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易令美联储最青睐的通胀指标前景不明
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的胜选推动股市上涨，这将给美联储首选的通胀指标带来上行压力，进而可能使利率持续走高。【原文：A stock-market rally boosted by President-elect Donald Trump’s victory is set to put upward pressure on the Federal Reserve’s preferred inflation gauge, which in turn could keep interest rates elevated.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行在出价前通知政府和 BPM 银行
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的知情人士称，该行在周一宣布收购意向之前，已向意大利政府高官和 Banco BPM SpA 主席通报了这一消息。【原文：UniCredit SpA informed top officials in the Italian government and Banco BPM SpA Chairman about its intention to make a takeover bid for its smaller rival before announcing the move on Monday, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 英国央行研究表明，英国数据可能低估了劳动力规模
item.description: 英国央行副行长克莱尔-隆巴代利（Clare Lombardelli）表示，英国就业市场上的工人数量可能比官方估计的要多得多，这有可能减轻决策者正在努力应对的不活跃危机。【原文：Britain may have many more workers in its jobs market than official estimates suggest, Bank of England Deputy Governor Clare Lombardelli said, potentially lessening an inactivity crisis policymakers are grappling with.】

item.title: 印尼称苹果 1 亿美元投资提议不公平
item.description: 一位政府高官表示，苹果公司在印尼投资 1 亿美元的提议不符合 "公平 "原则，这表明雅加达在解除国内 iPhone 16 销售禁令之前正在寻求进一步的新调整。【原文：Apple Inc.’s proposal to invest $100 million in Indonesia hasn’t met “fairness” principles, a top government official said, signaling Jakarta is seeking further neogtiations before lifting a ban on domestic iPhone 16 sales.】

item.title: 土耳其货币市场基金将投入 29 亿美元购买里拉债券
item.description: 土耳其新规定货币市场基金必须将至少 10%的投资组合分配给政府债券，这将使数十亿里拉流入国债，从而推动对收益率曲线短端的需求。【原文：Turkey’s new requirement for money-market funds to allocate at least 10% of their portfolios to government bonds is set to channel billions of liras into Treasury debt, driving up demand for the short end of the yield curve.】

item.title: 康宁出价解决欧盟对 "大猩猩玻璃 "的反垄断调查
item.description: 康宁公司（Corning Inc.）做出一系列承诺，以解决欧盟对其智能手机屏幕防碎 "大猩猩玻璃 "涉嫌独家经营的反垄断调查。【原文：Corning Inc. offered a slate of commitments in a bid to settle an European Union antitrust probe over alleged exclusive deals for its break-resistant “Gorilla Glass” in smartphone screens.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行的 BPM 曲线球让梅洛尼在银行计划上陷入困境
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）出人意料地出价收购 Banco BPM SpA，这让意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）的政府陷入困境，不知其创建意大利第三大银行集团的计划是否已经泡汤。【原文：UniCredit SpA’s surprise bid for Banco BPM SpA has left Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni’s government struggling to work out if its plans to create Italy’s third major banking group are now defunct.】

item.title: 由于贸易战风险被低估，美国银行预计新兴市场货币将下滑 5
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的策略师预测，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）担任总统期间，投资者低估了贸易战的风险。【原文：Investors are underestimating trade war risks under a Donald Trump presidency, according to strategists at Bank of America Corp. who predict a 5% slide in emerging-market currencies over the first half of 2025, and a selloff in sovereign debt.】

item.title: 空中出租车制造商 Vertical 获得 Mudrick Capital 的救助
item.description: 飞行出租车初创公司垂直宇航有限公司（Vertical Aerospace Ltd.）表示，该公司已从穆德里克资本管理公司（Mudrick Capital Management）获得多达 5000 万美元的新资金，为测试和认证其首款车型提供了资金上的喘息空间。【原文：Flying taxi startup Vertical Aerospace Ltd. said it had secured as much as $50 million in new funding from Mudrick Capital Management, giving it financial breathing room to test and certify its first model.】

item.title: 以色列在权衡战争通胀和经济放缓问题时将维持利率不变
item.description: 以色列中央银行将连续第七次维持利率不变，因为它正在权衡加沙和黎巴嫩战争如何加速通货膨胀和减缓经济发展。【原文：Israel’s central bank is set to hold interest rates for a seventh consecutive time, as it weighs how wars in Gaza and Lebanon are quickening inflation and slowing the economy.】

item.title: VIX 看涨期权还是 S&P 500 看跌期权？随着交易量峰值消退，争论仍在继续
item.description: 说到套期保值，投资者应该青睐 VIX 看涨期权还是 S&P 500 指数看跌期权？随着 Cboe 波动率指数的飙升变得越来越短暂，这个问题也变得越来越重要。【原文：When it comes to hedging, should investors favor VIX calls or S&P 500 Index puts? The question has become central as spikes in the Cboe Volatility Index have grown increasingly ephemeral.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司在美国调查中停止对阿达尼实体的投资
item.description: 道达尔能源 SE 表示，在印度企业集团阿达尼集团（Adani Group）创始人高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）及其他个人被美国起诉行贿的后果得到澄清之前，道达尔能源 SE 不会对该集团进行任何新的投资。【原文：TotalEnergies SE said it won’t make any fresh investment in Indian conglomerate Adani Group until the consequences of US bribery indictments against founder Gautam Adani and other individuals have been clarified.】
